nodes.text: Eton was a gas giant–type planet with forty-one moons that occupied the seventh orbital position around the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the Unknown Regions' 7G sector.
Eton was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Eton, in grid square G-7.
